data.title: H2H, prediction of Raul Garcia vs Garrett Johns in Santa Cruz De La Sierra 2 Challenger with odds, preview, pick
data.meta_description: PREVIEW. Santa Cruz De La Sierra 2 Challenger. Garcia and Johns will fight against each other in the 1st round of the Santa Cruz de la Sierra 2 Challenger. See the prediction, H2H stats, odds, and preview of their upcoming match on Monday the 17th of June
data.meta_site_name: Tennis Tonic - News, Predictions, H2H, Live Scores, stats
data.text:
Raul Garcia and Garrett Johns will square off in the 1st round of the Santa Cruz de la Sierra 2 Challenger for the 1st time in their career. They are scheduled to play on Monday at 8:30 pm on CANCHA CENTRAL. Here the head to head stats and relative prediction.

Prediction, odds and live streaming

The pick for Tennis Tonic is Garrett Johns who should win in 2 sets.

As per the initial odds, Garrett Johns is the pick to win this match.

Garrett Johns -> 1.093

Raul Garcia -> 6.4

Click here to see the updated quotes and live streaming (only selected countries - USA excluded).

To be able to watch live streaming bet365, a funded account is required or you need to have placed a bet in the last 24 hours. 18+ BeGambleAware.

Here where top tennis events are broadcasted or streamed online (ATP, WTA).

At the challenger level, there will be free live streaming on Challenger TV.

Prediction and head to head Raul Garcia vs. Garrett Johns

There is no head to head record between Raul Garcia and Garrett Johns since this will be the first time that they will face off in the main tour.

Raul Garcia

Currently unranked, Raul will start his run in the Santa Cruz de la Sierra 2 Challenger after he played his last match in M25 Pensacola where he lost 6-1 2-6 10-8 to Bobo in the qualifications on the 14th of May.

Raul has an aggregate 0-1 win-loss record in 2024, 0-1 on clay (See FULL STATS).

Talking about his overall career, Raul has an overall 4-7 record. He has a negative 4-6 record on clay.

Previously in the Santa Cruz de la Sierra 2 Challenger

Garcia has never competed in this tournament before.

Garrett Johns

Ranked no. 440 (career-high), Johns will start his run in the Santa Cruz De La Sierra 2 Challenger after he played his last match in the Lima 1 Challenger where he lost 6-0 6-3 to Pucinelli De Almeida in the 2nd round on the 12th of June.

Johns has a composed 7-4 win-loss record in 2024, 6-2 on clay (See FULL STATS).

Garrettâ€™s best result of the current year was getting to the final in M15 Vero Beach.

In terms of his career, Johns has an overall 95-56 record. He has a positive 27-17 record on clay.

Upcoming matches in the draw
